Based on their message, they seem interested in the "comedy" genre. Here are two movie recommendations from this list: 

- The Nice Guys (2014) directed by Richard Linklater. It is a comedy that revolves around two private investigators who are hired to find an missing woman. Along the way, they encounter several obstacles and challenges that test their skills, intelligence, and determination.

- Liar Liar (1997) directed by Tom Shanks. It is a comedy that revolves around a young lawyer named Daniel Daymond (played by Will Smith)) who is hired to represent the parents of a boy who is killed in a car accident. As soon as he arrives at the scene of the accident, he realizes that something is very wrong with this case. He quickly begins to investigate the incident and find out what really happened during the car accident.
